system.description:
The depths of your martial studies allow the development of heretofore unheard of styles of combat, particularly when using your chosen weapon.  You gain the following benefits:

  • You gain proficiency in another combat tradition of your choice, and you learn one maneuver from it that does not count against your maneuvers known.  If this bonus maneuver requires you to make one or more attacks with a weapon, it must be one you could use with your Mastered Weapon.  
  • Furthermore, you may count half your scholar levels as fighter levels for the purpose of determining if you have extra attack and how many attacks you can make with it, and half your fighter levels count as scholar levels for the purpose of how much bonus damage is dealt when using @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.v4pkjilh484jph6i]{Precision Strikes}.  These benefits only apply when attacking with your Mastered Weapon.
